1 Virtual Reality in Psychological Research Welcome to Virtual Reality in Psychological Research, an open-access resource exploring how VR is used in psychology. This book introduces key concepts, methodologies, and case studies to support learners and researchers engaging with immersive technology. 1.1 About the Author Sarunė Savickaitė-Exeter is a researcher and educator passionate about the intersection of psychology, virtual environments, and inclusive education. She works with XR technologies and is committed to accessible, neurodiverse-friendly learning. 1.2 Chapters This book was built using the Bookdown package in R and published via GitHub Pages.
